headline: Dominion Energy Charitable Foundation Awards Grants to 388 Nonprofits
summary: RICHMOND, Va., December 15, 2025--The Dominion Energy Charitable Foundation recently awarded $3.5 million in grants to nonprofit organizations across multiple states.
